Instruction: Combine flour, ginger, baking soda, and salt in a bowl and whisk together.

Cream together brown sugar and butter in a large mixing bowl until smooth. Mix in egg and molasses. Gradually add and stir in the flour mixture with a wooden spoon. Stir in crystallized and fresh ginger. Cover the dough and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or overnight.
Roll the dough into 1-inch balls and arrange them on ungreased baking sheets approximately 2 inches apart.
Bake cookies in preheated oven until lightly golden, approximately 10 minutes. Remove from oven and allow cookies to cool on wire racks.
